title: California National Historic Trail: Auto Tour Route - Oregon
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Auto Tour Route - Oregon                Auto Tour Route - Oregon       Below the map are driving directions to follow the Auto Tour Route for the California National Historic Trail north to Oregon, from California.       Auto Tour Route driving directions for Oregon. NPS Image       Applegate Route:  1. Take State Route 39 north to State Route 66. 2. Turn west onto State Route 66 at Klamath Falls. 3. Take State Route 66 west to Interstate 5. 4. Turn onto I-5 north at Ashland. 5. Take I-5 north to State Route 99 north at Eugene. 6. State Route 99 becomes State Route 99W. 7. Turn west onto Clow Corner Rd. and follow to Dallas and the trail's end.  Total original route miles in Oregon (including alternate routes): 424
